title: Birth of a monster
creator_credit: John Lamond, Ian Crawford and Zanthus Films
brief_description: Ocean Digger an off-shore oil drilling rig is the monster - ugly, unwieldy, gigantic, with a mammoth job to do in the off-shore search for oil and gas. Her construction, launching and fitting out at the Whyalla shipyards are shown in detail. Narrated by Terry Norris.
creator_credit_for_label: John Lamond, Ian Crawford and Zanthus Films
